name: Law Office of Evan D. George Reviews

review.title: “Excellent Work Environment”
review.pros: Pros – Evan George, who runs the law office, is completely wonderful and polite and friendly to those who work for him. The cases are interesting and he really cares about his clients.
review.cons: Cons – There is a dog in the office. The dog is very friendly, but this would be a con if you don't like dogs or have allergies.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep it up!
